mapper.update: update bl_role_authority set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authority_id = #{authorityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authority_type = #{authorityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, role_id, authority_id, authority_type, create_time, create_by from bl_role_authority
